author: game.changer.wallet
title: GameChanger: Most required features
description: GameChanger users requested lots of features that have been addressed, but we're delayed on other key features we want to prioritize.
solution: We have listened to you GameChangers! And we propose to focus on the features that you've requested the most.
experience: We have made GameChanger, our product is a highly humanized and gamified wallet. We are committed to newcomers, students and builders.
